General.Name: Tianshui Huatian Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianshui Huatian Technology Co., Ltd. provides integrated circuit packaging and testing services in India and internationally. It offers lead frame, substrate, and flip chip packaging products; system-in-package, bumping, and wafer level products, as well as MEMS and sensors; testing services; and co-design simulation services. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Tianshui, China.
